TEXT.TITLE: <AGRA INDUSTRIES LTD> SIX MTHS JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 35 cts vs 34 cts Oper net 2,313,000 vs 1,646,000 Revs 100.1 mln vs 77.3 mln Note: 1986 net excludes extraordinary loss of 294,000 dlrs or four cts vs shr vs yr-ago loss of 579,000 dlrs or 12 cts shr. 1986 net includes non-cash loss of 1,436,000 dlrs or 22 cts shr vs yr-ago loss of 1,922,000 dlrs or 39 cts shr from depreciation and amortization allowances on U.S. cable TV operation. Fewer shrs outstanding. Reuter
